name: Authlete, Inc.
description: Developer of an OpenID-certified and Financial-Grade API-compliant tool designed to support identity assurance and grant management extensions. The company offers security software that is built on open authorization and OpenID connect access delegation standards, enabling businesses to grant websites or applications access to their information without the need to reveal passwords.
one_liner: Developer of an OpenID-certified and Financial-Grade API-compliant tool designed to support identity assurance and grant management extensions. The company offers security software that is built on open authorization and OpenID connect access delegation standards, enabling businesses to grant websites or applications access to their information without the need to reveal passwords.

name: Innovative Learning Kft
description: Developer of an online training platform designed to teach secure software building using hands-on IT security exercises and tutorials. The company's platform covers topics like web security, secure coding in Java, C/C++, incident response, threat analysis, secure API design as well and DevSecOps and offers a library of IT security exercises, enabling users to increase security awareness, enrich existing IT security training and allow self-directed learning, for continuous professional development.
one_liner: Developer of an online training platform designed to teach secure software building using hands-on IT security exercises and tutorials. The company's platform covers topics like web security, secure coding in Java, C/C++, incident response, threat analysis, secure API design as well and DevSecOps and offers a library of IT security exercises, enabling users to increase security awareness, enrich existing IT security training and allow self-directed learning, for continuous professional development.

name: Blind Insight, Inc.
description: Developer of a data insights platform designed for preserving privacy, security, and data sovereignty. The company's platform offers sensitive data without revealing its contents and operates on and shares data for social good, business intelligence, and profit while remaining compliant and secure, enabling businesses to improve their products and services without sacrificing user privacy.
one_liner: Developer of a data insights platform designed for preserving privacy, security, and data sovereignty. The company's platform offers sensitive data without revealing its contents and operates on and shares data for social good, business intelligence, and profit while remaining compliant and secure, enabling businesses to improve their products and services without sacrificing user privacy.

name: Capy Inc.
description: Developer of online security software designed to protect websites against password brute-force attacks, spam and fraud. The company's software offers sable CAPTCHAs and other authentication alternatives to make login procedures secure, enabling users to protect enterprise websites in a hassle-free manner.
one_liner: Developer of online security software designed to protect websites against password brute-force attacks, spam and fraud. The company's software offers sable CAPTCHAs and other authentication alternatives to make login procedures secure, enabling users to protect enterprise websites in a hassle-free manner.

name: Cicada Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of a bond trading platform intended to bring efficiency, transparency, and fairness to the financial systems. The company's technology provides connectivity and access to bond securities in emerging markets, enabling investors to invest in bonds easily.
one_liner: Developer of a bond trading platform intended to bring efficiency, transparency, and fairness to the financial systems. The company's technology provides connectivity and access to bond securities in emerging markets, enabling investors to invest in bonds easily.

name: Cobalt Labs Inc.
description: Developer of a pen testing as a service platform designed to transform the traditional broken test model into a data-driven vulnerability management engine. The company's platform delivers actionable results that empower agile teams to pinpoint, track, and remediate software vulnerabilities, enabling businesses to benefit from pen test findings, faster remediation times, and higher ROI for their pen test budget.
one_liner: Developer of a pen testing as a service platform designed to transform the traditional broken test model into a data-driven vulnerability management engine. The company's platform delivers actionable results that empower agile teams to pinpoint, track, and remediate software vulnerabilities, enabling businesses to benefit from pen test findings, faster remediation times, and higher ROI for their pen test budget.

name: Hopae, Inc.
description: Stripe for Digital Identity. Hopae helps enterprises seamlessly integrate sophisticated wallet/eID verification systems worldwide without prior knowledge of DID technology or regulatory compliance.
one_liner: Stripe for Digital Identity. Hopae helps enterprises seamlessly integrate sophisticated wallet/eID verification systems worldwide without prior knowledge of DID technology or regulatory compliance.

name: IDwall Technology LTDA
description: Developer of an identity verification platform designed to improve user authentication and fraudulent detection. The company's platform extracts data from document images and checks whether the data and users' faces match the public source in real-time, enabling businesses to verify their customers' data in sign-ups and purchases and operate safely.
one_liner: Developer of an identity verification platform designed to improve user authentication and fraudulent detection. The company's platform extracts data from document images and checks whether the data and users' faces match the public source in real-time, enabling businesses to verify their customers' data in sign-ups and purchases and operate safely.

name: Incognito Technologies Inc.
description: Provider of information technology services intended for effective quality assurance in the field of system solutions. The company manages the information technology infrastructure from concept to completion and develops industry-specific enterprise resource planning, enabling clients to access information technology products and services that comply with the latest trends in the market.
one_liner: Provider of information technology services intended for effective quality assurance in the field of system solutions. The company manages the information technology infrastructure from concept to completion and develops industry-specific enterprise resource planning, enabling clients to access information technology products and services that comply with the latest trends in the market.

name: Jmem Technology Co, Ltd.
description: Developer of One time programmable Memory (OTP) technology, designed to provide high-security usage such as data storage and function activation. The company's new multi-state memory is designed to address the shortcomings of existing disposable memory, such as inadequate security and large size, which takes advantage of polysilicon and High-K and different component structures that can be easily stacked and at low cost, providing users with security solutions in the IoT industry, automotive and electronic products.
one_liner: Developer of One time programmable Memory (OTP) technology, designed to provide high-security usage such as data storage and function activation. The company's new multi-state memory is designed to address the shortcomings of existing disposable memory, such as inadequate security and large size, which takes advantage of polysilicon and High-K and different component structures that can be easily stacked and at low cost, providing users with security solutions in the IoT industry, automotive and electronic products.

name: Kondukto Teknoloji A.Ş.
description: Developer of an application security testing platform intended to offer an automated and centralized vulnerability management process. The company's platform integrates with various tools used by organizations and automates the work of application security engineers in software development processes and also manages the whole process of finding vulnerabilities, enabling clients to automate and centralize the tasks associated with application security testing processes.
one_liner: Developer of an application security testing platform intended to offer an automated and centralized vulnerability management process. The company's platform integrates with various tools used by organizations and automates the work of application security engineers in software development processes and also manages the whole process of finding vulnerabilities, enabling clients to automate and centralize the tasks associated with application security testing processes.

name: Appaegis Inc.
description: Developer of agentless zero-trust access system intended to connect users with enterprise applications. The company's technology blocks attacks from zero-day exploits, while keeping enterprise data within its secure access service edge framework regardless of the choice of architecture, platforms, and existing portfolio of products, enabling customers to gain full visibility and control of how users interact with applications.
one_liner: Developer of agentless zero-trust access system intended to connect users with enterprise applications. The company's technology blocks attacks from zero-day exploits, while keeping enterprise data within its secure access service edge framework regardless of the choice of architecture, platforms, and existing portfolio of products, enabling customers to gain full visibility and control of how users interact with applications.

name: Nuve, Inc.
description: Developer of a sensor-based technology and a mobile application designed to prevent the theft of fuel and cargo. The company utilizes sensors technology to offer an asset protection system with real-time notifications, enabling businesses to better protect, control and monitor their cargo.
one_liner: Developer of a sensor-based technology and a mobile application designed to prevent the theft of fuel and cargo. The company utilizes sensors technology to offer an asset protection system with real-time notifications, enabling businesses to better protect, control and monitor their cargo.

name: Ohalo Limited
description: Developer of an online data compliance platform designed to facilitate secured and automated data sharing across multiple networks. The company's platform utilizes data compliance algorithms and blockchain technology to connect into a generalized application programming interface, as well as provides infinite flexibility to calibrate ad-hoc data sharing arrangements according to individual data compliance needs, enabling financial institutions to share jurisdictional and financial data quickly and safely.
one_liner: Developer of an online data compliance platform designed to facilitate secured and automated data sharing across multiple networks. The company's platform utilizes data compliance algorithms and blockchain technology to connect into a generalized application programming interface, as well as provides infinite flexibility to calibrate ad-hoc data sharing arrangements according to individual data compliance needs, enabling financial institutions to share jurisdictional and financial data quickly and safely.

name: Penfield AI Inc.
description: Developer of a cybersecurity platform designed to enhance security operations through process automation and performance optimization. The company's platform equips security teams with AI-powered tools for process standardization, bottleneck analysis and personalized automation, enabling clients to streamline workflows, optimize performance and elevate overall security posture.
one_liner: Developer of a cybersecurity platform designed to enhance security operations through process automation and performance optimization. The company's platform equips security teams with AI-powered tools for process standardization, bottleneck analysis and personalized automation, enabling clients to streamline workflows, optimize performance and elevate overall security posture.

name: Reelables, Inc.
description: Developer of Bluetooth labels designed to keep track of shared things at work as tools. The company's labels automatically track anything, keep an audit trail of things moving, and integrate into ERP systems, enabling companies to keep track of inventory, assets, and orders.
one_liner: Developer of Bluetooth labels designed to keep track of shared things at work as tools. The company's labels automatically track anything, keep an audit trail of things moving, and integrate into ERP systems, enabling companies to keep track of inventory, assets, and orders.

name: Seventh Sense Artificial Intelligence Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence(AI) based computer vision technology designed for the defense, security, surveillance, and retail markets. The company's technology includes face verification and edge AI which allows the optimization of complex algorithms for low-cost, low-compute, low-power, edge hardware devices and detect, recognize, and compare facial images, enabling clients to help build products that help in making cities and communities smart and safe.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence(AI) based computer vision technology designed for the defense, security, surveillance, and retail markets. The company's technology includes face verification and edge AI which allows the optimization of complex algorithms for low-cost, low-compute, low-power, edge hardware devices and detect, recognize, and compare facial images, enabling clients to help build products that help in making cities and communities smart and safe.

name: ShardSecure, Inc.
description: Developer of a data protection technology designed to securely store and share sensitive data in the cloud. The company's technology provides comprehensive data protection by limiting access, understandability, and value of sensitive cloud data, without the cost structure and operational issues inherent in encryption, enabling enterprises and government agencies to have simplified data security alternatives.
one_liner: Developer of a data protection technology designed to securely store and share sensitive data in the cloud. The company's technology provides comprehensive data protection by limiting access, understandability, and value of sensitive cloud data, without the cost structure and operational issues inherent in encryption, enabling enterprises and government agencies to have simplified data security alternatives.

name: Smile Identity, Inc.
description: Developer of an identity management platform designed to monitor customer records easily. The company's platform includes a neutral network of image recognition algorithms and a turnkey service for any bank, telecom, or application-based service that needs remote biometric enrollment, ID validation, and authentication with no special hardware, enabling companies to scale rapidly by confirming the true identity of their users in real time, using any smartphone or computer.
one_liner: Developer of an identity management platform designed to monitor customer records easily. The company's platform includes a neutral network of image recognition algorithms and a turnkey service for any bank, telecom, or application-based service that needs remote biometric enrollment, ID validation, and authentication with no special hardware, enabling companies to scale rapidly by confirming the true identity of their users in real time, using any smartphone or computer.

name: TRUSTDOCK Inc.
description: Developer of e-KYC and identity confirmation API software designed to facilitate trusted business relationships and transactions. The company's services provide individual identity confirmation API, personal number acquisition API, risk check API, and mailing API, amongst other offerings, enabling individuals, businesses, and corporate clients to authenticate their digital identity in a convenient and hassle-free manner.
one_liner: Developer of e-KYC and identity confirmation API software designed to facilitate trusted business relationships and transactions. The company's services provide individual identity confirmation API, personal number acquisition API, risk check API, and mailing API, amongst other offerings, enabling individuals, businesses, and corporate clients to authenticate their digital identity in a convenient and hassle-free manner.

name: UpGuard, Inc.
description: Developer of a third-party risk and attack surface management platform designed to reduce cyber risk, prevent breaches, and protect customer data. The company's platform combines third-party security ratings, security assessment questionnaires, and threat intelligence capabilities to give businesses a full and comprehensive view of their risk surface, enabling clients to continuously improve cybersecurity ratings, detect data exposures, and control risks.
one_liner: Developer of a third-party risk and attack surface management platform designed to reduce cyber risk, prevent breaches, and protect customer data. The company's platform combines third-party security ratings, security assessment questionnaires, and threat intelligence capabilities to give businesses a full and comprehensive view of their risk surface, enabling clients to continuously improve cybersecurity ratings, detect data exposures, and control risks.

name: Verisoul, Inc.
description: Developer of a decentralized platform intended to help companies identify and prevent fake users like bots, duplicate accounts, and fraudsters. The company's platform pairs anonymity with accountability and partners with web3 builders to allow them to discern trusted users from fraudsters, scammers, and bots, without sacrificing user privacy, enabling builders and communities to have faith in the person on the other end of every interaction.
one_liner: Developer of a decentralized platform intended to help companies identify and prevent fake users like bots, duplicate accounts, and fraudsters. The company's platform pairs anonymity with accountability and partners with web3 builders to allow them to discern trusted users from fraudsters, scammers, and bots, without sacrificing user privacy, enabling builders and communities to have faith in the person on the other end of every interaction.

name: Wivity Inc.
description: Developer of a governance and SaaS infrastructure designed for industry web3 collaborations. The company's framework combines consortium best practices with decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) mechanics, helping industries in implementing and governing decentralized infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a governance and SaaS infrastructure designed for industry web3 collaborations. The company's framework combines consortium best practices with decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) mechanics, helping industries in implementing and governing decentralized infrastructure.

name: Efflux Systems, Inc.
description: Developer of an automated cybersecurity platform designed to detect post-exploit threat actor behavior within enterprise networks. The company's automated cybersecurity platform offers cyber threat discovery and alert, eradication and containment services, enabling users to simplify and automate manual analytics to find hackers inside their network before data is lost.
one_liner: Developer of an automated cybersecurity platform designed to detect post-exploit threat actor behavior within enterprise networks. The company's automated cybersecurity platform offers cyber threat discovery and alert, eradication and containment services, enabling users to simplify and automate manual analytics to find hackers inside their network before data is lost.

name: Apigy Inc.
description: Provider of a virtual door locking application designed to unlock doors via remote control. The company's virtual door locking application fits over the lock control mechanism on the inside of a door, and the door can then be unlocked via an application on the phone or via web page control, enabling consumers to unlock doors without keys.
one_liner: Provider of a virtual door locking application designed to unlock doors via remote control. The company's virtual door locking application fits over the lock control mechanism on the inside of a door, and the door can then be unlocked via an application on the phone or via web page control, enabling consumers to unlock doors without keys.

name: Nodal Industries, LLC
description: Developer of network security devices. The company provides plug n' play network security device which provides security from online threats.
one_liner: Developer of network security devices. The company provides plug n' play network security device which provides security from online threats.

name: Tinfoil Security, Inc.
description: Developer of website and application programming interface (API) security software designed to make website and mobile security accessible to the world. The company's web application scanner checks website vulnerabilities using automated scan checks and tracks external hackers picking through each access point on the website, enabling developers to identify how to fix vulnerable areas before they get hacked.
one_liner: Developer of website and application programming interface (API) security software designed to make website and mobile security accessible to the world. The company's web application scanner checks website vulnerabilities using automated scan checks and tracks external hackers picking through each access point on the website, enabling developers to identify how to fix vulnerable areas before they get hacked.

name: Gluwa, Inc.
description: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.
one_liner: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.

name: Fakespot, Inc.
description: Developer of an online data authentication platform designed to prevent fake and misleading content from deceiving consumers. The company's application software analyzes product reviews and provides potential buyers with a grade based on the authenticity of the review, enabling consumers to detect fake reviews on Amazon, TripAdvisor, Yelp and the Apple App Store.
one_liner: Developer of an online data authentication platform designed to prevent fake and misleading content from deceiving consumers. The company's application software analyzes product reviews and provides potential buyers with a grade based on the authenticity of the review, enabling consumers to detect fake reviews on Amazon, TripAdvisor, Yelp and the Apple App Store.

name: WhoAPI Inc.
description: Provider of domain data via the API. The company provides domain availability and advanced WHOIS data output.
one_liner: Provider of domain data via the API. The company provides domain availability and advanced WHOIS data output.

name: Safe Shepherd, LLC.
description: Provider of services for people to protect their privacy. The company's website enables users to see, remove and protect their personal information from the Internet.
one_liner: Provider of services for people to protect their privacy. The company's website enables users to see, remove and protect their personal information from the Internet.
